channel.title: [317 - Allstar] SpectralX
channel.description:
SpectralX is back under development! Base: Allstar This is my first project, I will release when finished. When I finish and release I will be moving on to Delta, or do a 525. I don't know yet. Pictures: Coming Soon. Updates:
2/8/12: Started Thread 2/8/12: Fixing little things, commands, teleports, dialogue 2/8/12: Fixed some models, Started Removing nulls 2/8/12: Added GS Stances 2/9/12: Started on Combat 2/9/12: Starting Removing Unneeded Customs 2/10/12: Added Primal 2/10/12: Started on New Skilling Area 2/10/12: Started On New home 2/10/12: Made new train area 2/10/12: Added new shop area 2/10/12: Fixed way Dragon claws look
I'm also looking for a development team, forms will be added soon. Please don't flame as well, this is my first project.

item.title: [317 - Allstar] SpectralX
item.dc:creator: @mr_dope mr dope
item.description:
@mr_dope wrote:

It’s good. I’m still working on remaking the skills and bosses though, but I’ve gotten a lot done since we last talked.

Read full topic

item.title: [317 - Allstar] SpectralX
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“Lotek™, post:8, topic:432270”]Currently trying to fix the problems with the Client, My Gui.java is messed up.

and what “glitches” did you fix on your Allstar?

Edit: Poll added, Vote for Pking or Eco. I’ll let you guys decide.[/quote]
Food timer, chin glitch
I voted Eco just because items originally are very easy to obtain and after you get rich and 99 everything in 2 hours you just pk really
